# unlock()

**Instance Method**

Relinquishes the receiver.

## Declaration

```swift
func unlock()
```

## Discussion

You should generally use the [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/NSDistributedLock/unlock()] method rather than [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/NSDistributedLock/break()] to release a lock.

An `NSGenericException` is raised if the receiver doesn’t already exist.

## Relinquishing a Lock

- **break()**: Forces the lock to be relinquished.

items.description: Forces the lock to be relinquished.

title: unlock()
